description:
Are you an handmade artist / maker who has a dream of getting your own products into retail stores? I too am an artist and now is the best time for us artists to get our products out there on a larger scale!

In this course, I will show you how to apply for and become an Etsy Wholesale Seller. Etsy Wholesale is a great platform for creators to showcase their handmade products to retail buyers. As an Etsy Artist myself, I will first hand walk you through everything you need to know to set up your wholesale shop on Etsy.

This course is set up as sections, which are then decided by lectures. This makes it easy for you to go at your own pace and follow along. Each sections builds on the last, so by the end of this course you will have a complete list of wholesale listings and you will be ready to start reaching out for wholesale deals.

*** SUGGESTION: If you want to be familiar with Etsy before taking this course, I suggest you take my first course "How To Sell Your Art Online With Etsy". In this course, I teach you how to set up a retail shop on Etsy.

Take this course if you want to take your Etsy shop to the next level and want to begin to sell wholesale. You can also take this course if you are not yet an Etsy seller but want to discover how easy it is to sell your products wholesale. This course is for makers who are ready to build their own brand.

I hope you will join me and I look forward to helping you make your dream a reality!
title: How To Become An Etsy Wholesale Seller
